page.title: 15Abbey Wells
page.content: Abbey Wells Childrens Home is situated in Woolton Hill.It is owned by the Hampshire County Council. It is a home for a few unfortunate children who require special care.The Officer-In-Charge is called Mr. Hall. There are nine children in residence at the moment, although it will hold eighteen children. There are only nine children because the home is closing down. Everyone is very unhappy about having to move somewhere else. The children are aged between nine and sixteen. They are looked after by seven care staff, seven social workers, two cooks and two domestics. Abbey Wells is hundred and twenty years old and used to be part of a large estate.
